summary: Enthusiastic third-year Computer Science Engineering student and IBM Certified Professional Full Stack Developer, driven by a passion for innovation in technology. As an AI enthusiast, I have immersed myself in the realms of creating captivating mobile and web applications. My journey has honed my skills in both front-end and back-end development, enabling me to architect seamless user experiences that resonate with modern demands. With a keen interest in AI and ML, I am actively engaged in AI-ML based projects, aiming to shape the future of digital technologies. Eager to contribute to the ever-evolving landscape of mobile and web development, leveraging my skills and knowledge to drive innovation and transformative experiences.

experience.description:
•	Spearheaded the development of a Secure Multi-Modal Authentication System at Bharat Intern, seamlessly integrating Google Login/Sign-Up, Facebook Authentication, and Email-Password mechanisms.
•	Implemented robust User Authentication & Authorization mechanisms for the "Blogosphere" app, employing JWT and Bcryptjs for enhanced data security.
•	Orchestrated seamless blog operations, enabling users to effortlessly create, edit, and manage content, while integrating Nodemailer for effective communication.
experience.title: Full Stack Developer

experience.description: As a full stack developer in CSMIT, I played a pivotal role in backend development for the intercollege symposium 'Carte Blanche'. Developed a website that efficiently manages the student participation and organization of events. Also, integrates a secure and user-friendly payment portal. This experience leverages my skills in backend development and API integration
experience.title: Full Stack Developer

experience.description: As a Cyber Security in Web Development Intern, I completed a comprehensive two-week internship as part of the IBM SkillsBuild Program. Throughout this experience, I delved into various aspects of Cyber Security including Cyber Security fundamentals, Online security, Job Essentials, and Enterprise design thinking. Additionally, I engaged in a Cyber Security tutorial provided by Simple Learn, enhancing my understanding of key concepts in safeguarding web assets. This internship, conducted in collaboration with Foundation for Excellence and Edunet Foundation, equipped me with invaluable hands-on experience and knowledge necessary to address contemporary digital security challenges within the context of web development.
experience.title: Web Cyber Security Intern

projects.description: This Data Science project, part of the Python Project for Data Science on Coursera powered by IBM, involves extracting financial data for popular stocks (Tesla, Amazon, AMD, and GameStop). As a Data Scientist, I utilized Python libraries and web scraping to gather historical share prices and quarterly revenue reports. The collected data will be visualized using Plotly to create a dashboard that displays key performance indicators.
projects.title: Predicting Price Movements: Visualizing Stock Price Forecasting Models in Python

member.occupation: Upcoming SWE Intern'24 @LinkedIn | Research fellow @TIH IoT IIT-B | AI-Driven Full Stack Developer

projects.description: In the Bank Loan Approval project, my pivotal role as the model trainer involved harnessing TensorFlow's power to craft a cutting-edge neural network. I meticulously curated and trained this model using diverse customer data, including insights from Lenddo's vast feature pool. My focus on fine-tuning parameters and refining architectures aimed to predict depositor behavior regarding personal loans. Analyzing past campaigns, I extracted key insights to enhance the model's accuracy beyond the 9% benchmark. Collaborating closely with management, my goal was to boost conversion rates, transforming depositors into loan customers and fueling substantial revenue growth for the bank.
projects.title: Bank Loan Approval Prediction With Artificial Neural Nets

member.occupation: Upcoming SWE Intern'24 @LinkedIn | Research fellow @TIH IoT IIT-B | AI-Driven Full Stack Developer

projects.description: Led as a Machine Learning Engineer in developing an advanced NLP-powered fake news detection system. Leveraged a dataset of labeled news articles, employing cutting-edge NLP techniques for text preprocessing and feature extraction. Orchestrated the training and validation of a sophisticated model integrating Convolutional Neural Networks and Bidirectional LSTMs using TensorFlow framework. Achieved a robust and accurate tool to differentiate between genuine and fake news, contributing to media literacy. This project aims to combat misinformation, promoting credible journalism. My role involved refining the model's architecture, optimizing training parameters, and ensuring its reliability in discerning false narratives from credible sources.
projects.title: Advanced Fake New Detection using NLP
